fullplot: An adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's Long Island-set novel, where Midwesterner Nick Carraway is lured into the lavish world of his neighbor, Jay Gatsby. Soon enough, however, Carraway will see through the cracks of Gatsby's nouveau riche existence, where obsession, madness, and tragedy await.
plot: A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.
title: The Great Gatsby

tomatoes.consensus: While certainly ambitious -- and every bit as visually dazzling as one might expect -- Baz Luhrmann's The Great Gatsby emphasizes visual splendor at the expense of its source material's vibrant heart.

writers: F. Scott Fitzgerald (based on the novel by)
